TopicTitle: Mod that adds lava lakes/oceans to Moho?

Articles.Content: Moho has always been a little boring, and I would visit there a lot more often if it had lakes/oceans of FREAKING LAVA. Unfortunally my searches haven't turned up any mods that add that... and I also have no idea how to modify Moho myself to give it lava oceans. Anyone know of any mods that add this?
